full_summary:
--------------------------------------------------------

**Title**: W0138-22A030-2
**English Title**: Acquisition and Delivery of Personal Protective Equipment Against Fuels and Flammable Products for DND Bagotville
**French Title**: L'Acquisition et de la livraison du matériel de protection personnelle contre les combustibles et les produits inflammables pour le MDN Bagotville

**Documentation Reference**: WS3664658508-Doc3885032358

**Tender Details**
-------------------

* **Closes on**: March 15, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: All provinces and territories of Canada, except the National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec, excluding the NCR
* **Expected Start Date**: None
* **Expected End Date**: February 1, 2023

**Procurement Method**: Open Tendering

**Bid Submission Requirements**

*   Bids must be submitted online through the [bidders area](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) 
*   Suppliers are required to register in the supplier registration system prior to submitting a bid.
*   All bid submissions must include a valid bid price and all required supporting documentation.
*   Bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT on March 15, 2023, will be considered non-responsive and will not be considered for evaluation.

**Evaluation Method**: The bid will be awarded to the supplier offering the lowest price.

**Additional Information**

*   The evaluation of bids will be conducted in accordance with the **Request for Proposal (RFP)** specifications.
*   A debriefing session will be provided upon request for bids submitted.

**Point of Contact**

*   For inquiries regarding this bid, please contact:

    LISA-MARIE JULIEN
    (SPAC/PSPC)
    Tel: [Not provided]
    Email: [lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
    Country: Canada

**Attachment**

*   Refer to the following documents for detailed information:

    Annexe A for Tendering Information; 

    Request for Proposal specifications and Appendix for this bid. 

**Procurement Entity**

*   D
